docs.title: 🧠 Welcome to My Project
docs.text:
This is the official documentation for the project.

  • Quick Start
  • Installation steps
  • Best practices

💡 Tip: Run mkdocs serve to preview locally before publishing.

docs.title: 📦 Installation
docs.text: Follow these steps to get GPT-RAG running:

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/Azure/GPT-RAG.git
cd GPT-RAG
pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: 🚀 Usage
docs.text:
Run the application:

python app.py

That's it! Your GPT-RAG application should now be running.
